name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 11, Beijing. Peking University professor Dai Jinhua said at the film "Another Day Full of Hope" theme talk: I was shocked to see the ratio of masters to bachelors among Beijing express delivery workers. The ratio of masters was once 7%, and the ratio of undergraduate graduates exceeded 13%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, financier Li Lu’s latest statement was circulated online, in which he mentioned: without a modern market economy, modern technology would not emerge; fair institutional control is more sustainable than human control; the essence of a market economy is the government handing over economic power to the private sector; without personal safety guarantees, people’s pursuit of wealth will be greatly reduced.
